lines.text: Oh, Mommy, Mommy, Mommy, Mommy!

[after John tells her not to use profanity in the news broadcasts]
When have I EVER used foul language, you rotten son-of-a-BITCH?
Did you really sign a reporter's contract "Peter Rabbit?"
Yes.
What did the reporter do?
Christy? She laughed her ass off.
Tickets. You already got the tickets?
Yes.
Why did you tell me?
Well, I didn't think you'd be that interested.
Dichotomy, Egregious, SHIT!
How could he be afraid of heights. He's so tall!
Siegenthaler! Kick satellite 11 for Christ's sakes!
[kicks satellite]
Again!
[kicks again]
Perfect!

[running in a marathon]
It may look like rain to the rest of you, but on Lake Shore Drive it's sunshine all the way.
[motorcycle drives by and wets her]
Ah! Thats right Chicago hit me, beat me I love it! This is Christy Colleran, Satellite Network News.
At 12 noon today 15,000 students from all 50 states, will be joined electronically to play "Darktown Strutters Ball" on the kazoo
[starts to chuckle]
for the President of the United States.
[starts to laugh harder]
The Prestident as you know is a former kazoo player and may wish to join in.
[laughing louder]
Wait a minute, wait a minute here, we're doing a story about 15,000 kazoo players and
[mockingly]
the President of the United States!
[laughing hysterically]

[talking on the phone]
I think my ex-wife is cracking up. What do you mean "give her a vacation"!
[sees Christy cracking up on the monitor]
Give her a vacation.
[Christy keeps on laughing uncontrolably]

[standing, thinking about his next move in repsonse to Ike Roscoe's possible pardon]
We're gonna kill him anyways.
So, you're what a network news man looks like.
And you sell jock straps!
25 million last year alone. You know if I'd invented that little baby, I'd be a rich man today.
I thought you were a rich man. Aren't you a multi-millionaire?
Depends on what you mean by multi.
Multi usually means more than one!
Blaine, sweetheart, we don't have to dicuss our finances with him.
Our?
Our.
How come there's a fire on channel four and we don't have it?
What fool shot the locks off all the doors?
He's pardoned.
You can't do that!
Yes I can. He's pardoned, and he's pardoned, and she's pardoned and you're not!
Yikes! If I'm going to be on tv tonight, I'd better take a nap!
Did you know that Chicago means, "the smell of wild onions?"
Did you New York just means, "New York?"
Blaine knows everything about food.
Now that's important. to know EVERYTHING about food.
